meanings.definition: Full of or resembling a mesh.
meanings.sent1: The soccer goal net was so meshy, it caught every ball easily.
meanings.sent2: The meshy fabric allowed air to flow through, keeping me cool.
meanings.sent3: The meshy fence looked like a giant spider web in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a meshy tangle, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The meshy texture of the carpet felt rough under my feet.

meanings.definition: Capable of being meshed or interlocked.
meanings.sent1: The gears were meshy, fitting perfectly together to turn smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle pieces were meshy, allowing them to connect easily.
meanings.sent3: His plan was so meshy that everything fell into place effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a meshy bond, unbreakable and strong.
meanings.sent5: The meshy relationship between the two countries led to successful collaborations.

meanings.sent1: The meshy screen door kept the bugs out while letting the breeze in.
meanings.sent2: The athlete wore a meshy jersey to stay cool during the game.
meanings.sent3: The meshy tent was perfect for stargazing on warm summer nights.
meanings.sent4: Her hat had a meshy design, allowing her head to breathe in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The meshy material of the bag made it durable and lightweight for travel.
